items.sentence: How would you feel in this situation if you were Tom?
How young were you when you first started doing that?
Tell me again where Tom is planning to go to college.
I think Tom paid far too much for that old saxophone.
I think Tom paid way too much for that old saxophone.
You don\'t have to hang around if you don\'t want to.
Tom and Mary built their house near the old oak tree.
Tom and Mary planned to meet at the botanical garden.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me why he did that.
Tom told me that Mary would be determined to do that.
